name: Mixie
description: MixieAI is a Web3-powered game creation platform that leverages artificial intelligence to assist users in designing gaming assets, environments, and full interactive experiences. Built for both creators and players, MixieAI integrates token farming, NFT utilities, and a collaborative AI engine to simplify the development of immersive, cross-platform games. It serves as both a creation tool and a community hub for gaming innovation.
